documentation.text:
@title PatientDataRegistry
 @dev Manages patient health data with privacy controls and consent management

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text: @dev Update consent permissions for existing data
@dev Set global consent settings for a patient
@dev Record data access for audit trail
@dev Check if address has access permission to data

devdoc.details: Manages patient health data with privacy controls and consent management

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

hasAccessPermission(address,uint256).details: Check if address has access permission to data

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recordDataAccess(uint256,string).details: Record data access for audit trail

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setConsentSettings(bool,bool,bool,uint25.details: Set global consent settings for a patient

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateConsent(uint256,bytes).details: Update consent permissions for existing data
